name: Isuru Gayan Dasanayake
title: Senior Mechanical Engineer
description:
I am a dynamic and energetic engineer eagerly waiting to contribute my skills and talents at my best 
for any challenging task either in academic or industrial community. A communicative, encouraging 
team player who presents ideas effectively, proactively and is able to assist others in the latest 
procedures.

about.text: I am a dedicated mechanical engineer with expertise in CAD design, finite element analysis, and product development. My career has spanned across automotive, aerospace, and consumer products industries, where I've led multidisciplinary teams to deliver innovative solutions.
details: Specialized in CAD/CAM systems including SolidWorks, CATIA, and AutoCAD
Experienced in finite element analysis (FEA) and computational fluid dynamics (CFD)
Proven track record in reducing production costs by 15-20% through design optimization
Strong background in materials science and manufacturing processes

experience.description: Lead a team of engineers in designing and testing components for next-generation aircraft. Implemented new design methodologies that reduced development time by 25%.
Designed and optimized automotive components using advanced CAD and simulation tools. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve product performance and manufacturability.

education.degree: Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering
education.description: Specialized in advanced materials and computational mechanics. Thesis on 'Optimization of Composite Materials for Aerospace Applications'.

publications.title: Advanced Composite Materials in Modern Aerospace Design
publications.description: Co-authored research paper exploring the application of novel composite materials in reducing aircraft weight while maintaining structural integrity.

awards.title: Excellence in Engineering Innovation Award
awards.description: Recognized for developing a novel cooling system that improved thermal efficiency by 30% in high-performance applications.

qualifications.title: Professional Engineer (PE) License
qualifications.issuer: National Council of Examiners for Engineering and Surveying
qualifications.description: Licensed Professional Engineer with demonstrated competency in mechanical engineering principles and practices.

researchActivities.title: Advanced Materials for High-Temperature Applications
researchActivities.description: Conducted research on novel composite materials capable of withstanding extreme temperatures for aerospace applications. Developed testing protocols and analyzed material performance under various conditions.

activitiesAssociations.title: Member, American Society of Mechanical Engineers
activitiesAssociations.description: Active member participating in conferences, workshops, and technical committees focused on advancing mechanical engineering practices and standards.

extracurricular.title: Volunteer, STEM Education Outreach
extracurricular.description: Volunteer as a mentor and guest lecturer for STEM programs at local high schools, inspiring the next generation of engineers and scientists.

projects.title: High-Efficiency Turbine Blade Design
projects.description: Led the redesign of turbine blades for improved aerodynamic efficiency, resulting in 12% increase in power output.
projects.fullDescription: This project involved extensive computational fluid dynamics analysis and wind tunnel testing to optimize the aerodynamic profile of turbine blades. The new design reduced drag by 15% while maintaining structural integrity under extreme conditions. The implementation of these blades in our flagship product line resulted in a measurable increase in energy generation efficiency.

knowledgeBase.question: What is your educational background?
knowledgeBase.answer: I hold a Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering from Stanford University, where I specialized in advanced materials and computational mechanics.

knowledgeBase.question: What industries have you worked in?
knowledgeBase.answer: Throughout my career, I've worked across automotive, aerospace, and consumer products industries, gaining diverse experience in mechanical design and product development.

knowledgeBase.question: What CAD software are you proficient with?
knowledgeBase.answer: I'm highly proficient with SolidWorks, CATIA, and AutoCAD, with over 8 years of experience using these tools for complex mechanical design projects.
